# init(_:)

**Initializer**

Creates a new key equivalent from the given character value.

## Declaration

```swift
init(_ character: Character)
```

## Creating a key equivalent

- **character**: The character value that the key equivalent represents.

items.description: The character value that the key equivalent represents.
items.name: character
